suite.name: TC 1001 home page

kw.name: Préparer environnement test
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout that is used by various keywords.

kw.name: Execute Javascript
kw.doc: Executes the given JavaScript code with possible arguments.

kw.name: Evaluate
kw.doc: Evaluates the given expression in Python and returns the result.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.
Prépare le navigateur et configure les délais.

test.name: TC-1001 Home Page Should Load Correctly

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.msg: ${expected_msg} = Les clients sont la priorité numéro un !
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Afficher informations testeur
Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
Affiche les informations du testeur dans la console.

kw.name: Vérifier message de réussite
Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
Log
kw.msg: Message trouvé en anglais : Customers Are Priority One!
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.arg: Aucun des messages attendus ('${expected_msg}', '${VALID_MSG_HOME_en}', '${VALID_MSG_HOME_fr}') n'a été trouvé.
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.
Vérifie si le message de succès attendu est présent, sinon vérifie la version alternative.

kw.name: Capture Screenshot If Test Failed
Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.

kw.name: Run Keyword If Test Failed
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if the test failed.
Capture une capture d'écran si le test échoue.

test.doc: Vérifie que la page d'accueil est accessible et que le contenu attendu est présent.

Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
Ferme proprement le navigateur.

Input Text

kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

suite.doc: TC-1006 & TC-1007 - Should be able to add all customers from test data dynamically - Should be able to cancel adding new customer.
